de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.texdef

Class AgdxTextureDefinitionLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.texdef.AgdxTextureDefinitionLoader

  • public class AgdxTextureDefinitionLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to load the textures from an *.agdtexdef file

                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex)
                            throws AgdtexdefParsingException
        Creates a new AgdxTextureDefinitionLoader. Does not start parsing - use parse() for this
        Parameters:
        agdxmlFile - the definition file
        tex - the texture for the definition
        Throws:
        AgdtexdefParsingException - if there are xml errors in the agdtexdef file
